attributes.action: Close the loophole where a terrorist groups political wing can protest in the UK
attributes.additional_details: The flying of a Hezbollah flag should be banned from protest in the UK it depicts the words "Party of Allah" above AK 47 and below "The Party of Allah should be triumphant" which is similar to that of the Iran Revolutionary guard. Flags from a military point of view for terrorist use insignia to its purpose to represent their ideology purpose and goals. It is terrorist images and propaganda. Those parading it is to spread its ideology which is their goal in any protest.
attributes.background: A wider debate on the terrorist use of protest to give credence to their violence within a anti-war protest and anti-democracy protests. When its aim is to undermine security forces upholding UK and international law. How prominent people give terrorist ideology credence to violence needs reviewing.
